LanguageData.LingAbiAppealReBack.label: Durability recovery
LanguageData.LingAbiAppealReBack.description: Repair the equipment worn by the target.
LanguageData.LingAbiBigFire.label: Raging fire
LanguageData.LingAbiBigFire.description: Release flames at the target location.
LanguageData.LingAbiBind.label: Rapid treatment
LanguageData.LingAbiBuE.label: be full
LanguageData.LingAbiBuKun.label: drowsy
LanguageData.LingAbiBuWan.label: Hideous Laughter
LanguageData.LingAbiCharge.label: charging
LanguageData.LingAbiCorpseExplosion.label: Corpse Explosion
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransfer.label: damage absorption
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransfer.description: Create a link to transfer all wounds on target body to the you within 12 hours (fatal injuries and disabilities cannot be transferred!)
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransOtr.label: damage feedback
LanguageData.LingAbiDamageTransOtr.description: Create a link to transfer all wounds on your body to the target within 12 hours (fatal injuries and disabilities cannot be transferred!)
LanguageData.LingAbiDepravation.label: decadent
LanguageData.LingAbiDepravation.description: Make the target addicted to all addictions
LanguageData.LingAbiForRabbit.label: Polymorph
LanguageData.LingAbiForRabbit.description: Turn the target into a snow rabbit.
LanguageData.LingAbiMadBeast.label: Dangerous beasts
LanguageData.LingAbiMadBeast.description: Summon a herd of undiscriminating beasts that hunt humans and destrory after being killed
LanguageData.LingAbiMakeAwife.label: False love
LanguageData.LingAbiMomDie.label: bereavement
LanguageData.LingAbiMomDie.description: Kill the target's mother in person
LanguageData.LingAbiObliviate.label: amnesiac
LanguageData.LingAbiObliviate.description: Clear the target's trait and skill level
LanguageData.LingAbiSexConversion.label: Gender transition
LanguageData.LingAbiSexConversion.description: Changing the gender of the target is not effective on unisexual creatures.
LanguageData.LingAbiShock.label: interrupt
LanguageData.LingAbiSkipAndBack.label: Spinjitzu
LanguageData.LingAbiSkipAndBack.description: Teleport to target, recover in 1.5 seconds.
